plot: A British engineer in India takes a simple native girl as his bride, an act which defies social strictures and leads to tragedy.
title: Without Benefit of Clergy
plot_es: A British engineer in India takes a simple native girl as his bride, an act which defies social strictures and leads to tragedy.
plot_en: A British engineer in India takes a simple native girl as his bride, an act which defies social strictures and leads to tragedy.
